sentence.Network_en: It was just gone 7 o'clock this evening when I finished.
sentence.Network_cn: 今晚我做完的时候刚过7点。

sentence.Network_en: He sat listening to the tick of the grandfather clock.
sentence.Network_cn: 他坐在那儿，听着落地式大摆钟嘀嗒作响。

sentence.Network_en: He was watching her fixedly, willing her to look at him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他凝视着她，希望她也看他。
